heading: Powerful HPC engines
subheading: Launch across clouds and clusters effortlessly.
paragraph: Out-of-the-box integrations for AWS, GCP and K8S plus batch schedulers including SLURM, LSF & Grid Engine.

heading: Portable & reproducible
paragraph: Docker, Singularity and Conda support to encapsulate all workflow dependencies across environments.

heading: Language agnostic
paragraph: The flexibility to develop, port and reuse code from any scripting language.

heading: Dataflow programming
paragraph: The reactive dataflow programming model can orchestrate billions of distributed tasks for truly massive workloads.

heading: Sharing & provenance
subheading: Track and store workflows as code.
paragraph: Integration with Git provides full traceability and hosting solutions allows your work to be shared with the world.

heading: 100% Open-source
paragraph: Licensed under the Apache software license 2.0.
